about_the_game:
Story

In this world, you are the only man. A mysterious epidemic has struck, leaving all men but the protagonist dead.
Save humanity with a pregnancy harem. The battle does not end until every being in this world is pregnant.


The protagonist, awakened from cryosleep, is guided by Nina from the Bits organization and asked to engage in sexual activities in a harem. To save humanity, the protagonist must impregnate many women; it is the only way left.

Game


The game is a simple clicker game, but the more you click, the more efficient the impregnation becomes.
For example, you can purchase a pregnancy factory to increase efficiency, or the protagonist can mutate into tentacles to impregnate on a large scale... There are plenty of variations to enjoy impregnating.
It comes with a simple touching feature; you can click on the females and enjoy their reactions. Rapid clicking increases the voltage gauge, and when the gauge reaches MAX, you can finish (ejaculate) and impregnate the female.

There are a total of 4 heroines. Each belongs to the human, elf, oni (demon), and dwarf races, and each one has two types of appearances prepared.

Features

  • Clicker game
  • 3D animated girls

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains 3D-animated, explicit sex scenes, sexual acts, and Restraint Sex. It is not suitable for all viewers. The characters in the game are over 18 years old.

name: LAST HAREM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
